my_favourite_bni_story: My Favourite BNI Story Before joining BNI, I had a very close friend. But as life went on, we lost touch for a few years and hardly had any contact. When I joined BNI, to my surprise, he was also a member of the same chapter. That moment itself was special because BNI not only helped me grow my business but also gave me back a friendship I had missed for years. Inside the chapter, our bond became even stronger. He supported me in every possible way—encouraging me, sharing ideas, and most importantly, giving me quality business referrals. Later, he decided to move on from BNI to focus on a different business. Usually, when someone leaves, the flow of referrals ends. But in my case, the story was different. Even after leaving BNI, my friend continues to send me a lot of business—without expecting anything in return, without hesitation, and with the same trust as before. This experience made me realize something very powerful: BNI is not just about business; it’s about building lifelong relationships. For me, this friendship and his continued support, even outside the chapter, is one of the most heartwarming and unforgettable experiences of my BNI journey.

my_business:
At Erode Scaales, we proudly manufacture and supply a wide range of high-quality electronic weighing machines under our own brand –"Erros". Our product line includes all models of weighing machines, from table-top Milligram scales to heavy-duty industrial platform weighbridge.
Alongside weighing solutions, we also deal in essential business equipment such as: Cash counting machines, Bundle note binding machine , Pouch Packing machine , Sealing machine , FIlling Machine , POS Machine , Receipt Printing scale , Label  Printing Scale , ECR Machine , Cash Register Machine , Billing Machine , Touch screen billing machine , Crane scale , Hand Pallet weighing scale, Customized Weighing scale , Baby weighing scale, etc.,
Every product is Indian-made, designed for accuracy, durability, and long-term service support. We serve a wide range of industries including retail, hospitals,Jwellery, industries, logistics, and traders – with a strong commitment to timely service and customer satisfaction.

top_problem_solved: A supermarket faced slow billing and inaccurate weighing, leading to customer complaints. We installed barcode-enabled weighing and GST billing systems for faster, accurate operations. Result: Reduced queues, smoother sales, and happy repeat customers.
my_favourite_bni_story: As a new member in BNI, I wasn’t sure what to expect—but within just a few meetings, I already began to feel the power of this network. One of my early moments came when a fellow member, after hearing my 30-second introduction, immediately connected me with someone who needed a weighing machine for their Bakery. It might have been a small sale—but for me, it was a big sign. It showed me that in BNI, people don’t wait years to trust you—they support you from day one, if you're genuine and consistent. The best part? I’ve already started building relationships with experienced business owners who are guiding me, encouraging me, and treating me like part of a business family. That’s something I’ve never experienced anywhere else. I’m excited for what lies ahead—and I know I’ve joined the right place to grow!
